name: Toon Tanks (itch) (OddPhishGames)
description:
Here is my version of Toon Tanks. I created this game by following the "Unreal 5.0 C++ Developer: Learn C++ and Make Video Games". The course covered a lot of ground with C++ programming, I found it quite difficult at parts but glad I could finish it, and I am now more confident in using Blueprints and C++ together.

One of my favourite features was adding a health bar and a post process effect when the health gets below 1/3rd. I also utilised the new Unreal Meta Sounds plugin, this allowed me to modulate the pitch of the engine sound I used so that it goes higher in pitch when the tank is accelerating, and back down when not moving.
